ing: 1/2 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
1/2 fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and sliced
des: "This is a easy but healthy smoothie that anyone can make. A little tang and a dash of sweet combine to make an excellent smoothie!"
ins: Blend milk, orange juice, mango, peach, pineapple, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.
